name: GeoGuess beta
description:
GeoGuess beta

Geoguess is a free OpenSource game with Google Map StreetView inspired by GeoGuessr.

When you start a round, you are teleport to a random position on Google Street View. Move and observe the vicinity. Try to guess where you are.

Features
  • 🎮 Multiplayer live : Play with your friends simultaneously
  •  📱 Mobile app :  PWA
  • 🌎 Customs Map : Build et customs your maps
  • 🔠 Translate : English, French, Czech, Deutsch and more soon
  • 🥇 Score, 🔍 history, 🔗 share and remake your games,...
Controls
  • Mouse : Moving & select position
  • Arrows : Moving
Links 
  • Website : https://geoguess.games/
  • Discord : https://discord.com/invite/9GXm6RT
  • RoadMap : https://github.com/GeoGuess/Geoguess/projects/3
  • Github : https://github.com/GeoGuess/Geoguess
